review: This was more that I expected for the Fire TV Stick less for Prime.  It was installed fast and no instructions are needed to use.  One area to improve is if you want people to become Prime members you need a better way to search movies and make it clear when you search you are only searching for movies that come with prime Not movies to buy!! also viewing photos from your tablet is harder than expected.  I agree with people that are mad that they can not view movies on their tablet.  Do not fall for yes you can with an android app.  Maybe you can but very hard to do and certainly not user friendly.  I am in a debate to stay with Netflix or swap to Prime??
author: Amazon Customer
